column2: Password visibility toggle disappear when user clicks out of the password field

When user input its password, it can click on password visibility toggle but when user click out of the password field it cannot click again on password visibility toggle because that function disappeared. The user should have the ability to view their password at any time, but the issue arises when the focus moves away from the password field. This is a functional bug.
